## redux-feature-auth-content package

Implementation of a redux feature to manage authoring content.

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |

|  [AuthContentFeatureState](./redux-feature-auth-content.authcontentfeaturestate.md) |  |
|  [AuthContentPropertyUpdatePayload](./redux-feature-auth-content.authcontentpropertyupdatepayload.md) |  |
